title: Frame Lag 5.19 (MAC)
body:
After the new patch, there is a frame lag even tho I'm running visuals on the previous settings. Have tried changing to the lowest settings possible but the frame lag still occurs.

Previously possible to run at 60+ fps, now it hovers at 30fps and drops to 10 or below in team fights. 

Also experiencing ping lag at 250ms. Previously was at 100ms and still playable.

Running macbook pro. 
Location: Singapore

Rito, please show us mac users some love {{item:3070}}
